home.description: Your platform for accessibility and communication. Empowering individuals to connect and thrive with innovative tools designed for inclusivity.
home.voiceNavigation: Looking for help? Use the voice button to navigate the platform.

about.title: About EcoVoz
about.description: EcoVoz is an innovative initiative created by Team 12 during the Autism Tech Hackathon 2024. Our goal is to provide a technological solution that enables people with speech or language disabilities to communicate effectively and inclusively, using artificial intelligence and assistive technology.
about.feature1: Advanced voice recognition for people with speech disabilities.
about.feature3: Integration with assistive devices for alternative communication.
about.feature5: Voice database for continuous training and improvement.
about.videoFallback: Your browser does not support videos.

testimony3.text: The integration with my assistive device is perfect!
testimony3.name: Ana

voiceInput.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1: How do I recover my password?
faq.a1: You can recover your password by clicking on the 'Forgot your password?' link on the login page. Enter your registered email and follow the instructions sent to your email.
faq.q2: Where can I edit my personal information?
faq.a2: You can edit your personal information by accessing the profile page. Click on your name in the top menu and select 'Profile'.
faq.q3: How can I contact technical support?
faq.a3: You can contact us directly through the form on this page or via the support email listed below.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need more help? Get in touch with us through the channels below.

linksPage.title: Resource Links
linksPage.subtitle: Find useful resources, support groups, and contact information for accessibility services.
linksPage.surdosAssociaçaoDescription: Organization dedicated to promoting the rights of deaf individuals in Brazil.
linksPage.centralInterpretesDescription: Service connecting individuals with professional interpreters for Libras.
linksPage.handTalkDescription: Application that translates texts and audios into Libras, assisting communication.
linksPage.surdosOnlineDescription: Portal with educational materials and news for the deaf community.
linksPage.brailleLibraryDescription: Organization providing Braille books, audiobooks, and accessible technologies.
linksPage.beMyEyesDescription: An app connecting blind individuals with volunteers for daily assistance via video calls.
linksPage.dorinaNowillDescription: Foundation offering books in Braille, audiobooks, and other support for visually impaired individuals.
linksPage.wheelchairAssociationDescription: Association offering support and activities for individuals with mobility impairments.
linksPage.movimentoLivreDescription: Organization promoting sports and inclusive activities for people with disabilities.
linksPage.rodrigoMendesDescription: Promotes inclusive education and supports educators in fostering accessibility.
linksPage.apaeDescription: An organization that works to promote inclusion for individuals with intellectual disabilities.
linksPage.inclusaoBrasilDescription: Portal providing information, rights, and news for individuals with intellectual disabilities and their families.
linksPage.disclaimer: The resources listed here are external to EcoVoz and are provided for informational purposes only.
